testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "ateet239101@example.com" field........................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "ateet239101@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".......passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSlider | user could click on the slider on the home page
testcase.name: user could click on nokia slider on home page

failure.message: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
Given user click on the "1" slider..........................................passed Then user could navigate to "nokia" page....................................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefs.D06_homeSlidersStepDef.userCouldNavigateToPage(D06_homeSlidersStepDef.java:25) at ✽.user could navigate to "nokia" page(file:///C:/Users/aahmed200/Downloads/demonopcommerce/src/main/resources/features/F06_homeSliders.feature:6)
